roleset.name: to last or experience for a long time

role.descr: thing endured or period of time

example.name: all arguments
example.text: This morning as I drove the 13 miles to my law office and endured the routine heavy traffic during that twice - daily journey , I thought of how fortunate it was that we made the decision to be residents of an expanding community with so many opportunities and where so much is happening .

example.name: intransitive
example.text: Veiling his message has helped him endure .

example.name: all arguments with adverbials
example.text: Now we must endure a rash of critics who apparently wish to know details of one side only .

propbank.arg: a rash of critics who apparently wish to know details of one side only

roleset.note: ENDURE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'endure' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from endure.01-v predicate notes)
